attributes.action: Give people the choice of opting in or out of the T.V. licence.
attributes.additional_details:
Recent biased views exemplified by the Daily Politics programme and continued 
lack of fair and unbiased reporting of political matters in this 
country. Anyone who seems to have an opposite or alternative view to the
 government are subjected to bullying tactics during interviews, thus 
trying to manipulate the arguments to make headline comments instead of 
more constructive analysis of complex situations. This occurs not only 
on the television but also on some of their radio stations.
attributes.background:
Due to a widespread view about the biased news reporting by the BBC, 
therefore breaching their charter as a public broadcaster, the time has 
come for people to be able to make their own choice as to whether or not
 they wish to continue funding the BBC.

rejection.details:
It's not clear what the petition is asking for. If you would like BBC channels to be available only to people who choose to pay for them, we already have a petition about that:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/112629
